website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're new to table tennis or have pro-level skills, this set has everything you need for your game – well-made components, plenty of rackets and balls, and a reassuring 60-day warranty.
pros: This complete set features 4 paddles with sturdy flared handles and 5-ply blades capable of excellent spin, speed, and traction
Comes with 8 top-quality balls and a tough carrying case
cons: Rare incidences of the blade backing coming unglued
Some owners noted a strange odor upon arrival that tends to fade over time

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Our JP WinLook (JPWL) paddles arrived promptly. I'm not ping pong expert but these paddles seem to play very well, they are comfortable in hand and everything was glued properly. The included ping pong balls are also good. A small card from JPWL that's inside the package encourages customers to contact them if there are any quality issues. Judging from the reviews that I read prior to making my purchase, it's evident that JPWL takes their customer service seriously and they do a great job of following through on customer concerns. Two thumbs up for the paddles and the customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Mertz

customer_reviews.title: From the Mouth of a Veteran Table Tennis Player
customer_reviews.text: Played with these paddles last night. I am a new comer to Table Tennis, but I was playing, or trying to, with a season veteran. It made me feel good about my purchase of the JP WinLook Paddles, when he commented quite strongly about the quality of the paddles. He also was pointed in his remarks that these paddles would allow much better placement and spin on the balls. So a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sudsy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I haven't experienced any of the defects listed on some reviews. Those must have been a bad batch. Bought a set of these for our office ping pong table and we've put them through one month of break and lunch matches and there is no peeling or any defects. Don't be fooled by those higher priced paddles with dorky names. These will do fine for any beginner or somebody who has been playing a while. Got an email from the company shortly after purchase telling me to reply to them if there are any issues. I never see that. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Whittlesworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three sets for gift-giving and could not be more delighted. They are well packaged, displayed and of reasonable price. The case is sturdy and the zipper is of decent quality. Enclosed was a note from the owner/seller in which he asked for feedback. I had an idea that was rather mundane so decided to email him. I did not expect an answer but to my amazement I received one! Immediate and friendly. So it must be said that the customer service was unbelievably present. What a fine example of exactly what consumers expect and deserve. We will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Hunny

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddles!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my family. We just got a ping pong table and we needed supplies. I wasn't sure what to buy so I checked out the reviews. These had a few mixed reviews, but they were the best value I could find. I haven't had any problems at all with these and judging by others praise of the customer service, I feel confident that any potential problem would be taken care of. My kids and my husband have been playing ping pong almost everyday since these arrived. I would recommend these to anyone looking for affordable ping pong paddles.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyCB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service is a dying art with the massive digital marketplace we shop in. Ping (the owner) made me feel important, and was genuinely concerned that I was happy with his product. Just for the customer service alone I give this 5 stars. As a bonus, the product itself is great. It is a perfect starter set for recreational players. The paddles seem well made, and the rubbers are great for the price. I take the time to review and research items before buying. Hopefully I can save you some time. Go ahead and get these, you will be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer A. Tycksen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service! and great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We really love these paddles. They are light and have great texture allowing the kids to put a good amount of spin on the ball. The balls are also high quality. We had an issue with one of the paddles, and they replaced it extremely quickly, with a hand-written note ! They also added a bonus present for our trouble. I'm impressed with JP WinLook's commitment to quality and warranty. We will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gribble

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddles For Players At Every Level
customer_reviews.text: My father and I have been playing ping pong for nearly a decade now, and have progressed from being barely able to rally to high speed spins and slams. We were looking for a set of paddles that would allow us to increase our skill set without being prohibitively expensive. After an all day tournament full of sweat, blood, tears, and beers, I can say that these paddles were perfect for our needs. They feel responsive and comfortable in the hand, although the handle feels slightly rougher than you might be accustomed too at first, and the padding allows you to apply spin and put the ball exactly where you want it. I would recommend these paddles to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hubb

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality. Nice sticky rubber for good spin!
customer_reviews.text: Our family just got a brand new ping pong table for our basement (super jazzed) and so, we were look for a new set of paddles for it. We are no professionals but make no mistake, we get pretty competitive about it! The paddles, I have to say, are far superior than our last few sets. They seem quite professional to me; I love the sticky feel of the rubber. Makes for a good spin! The paddles have the perfect weight in our hands and have a nice finish. They seem very durable and should last many, many matches! Love the storage bag as well. They are handy for whenever we take them to the cottage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this set of JP WinLook 4 pack. Paddles seem well made and look similair to more expensive paddles on Amazon . Set came very nicely packaged ( have an odor from packaging glue) with a nice carry case. The balls included were also decent quality. A group of us play at work on break and lunches. So paddles should see 45 minutes to an hour each day of play. Group seems to all like them. They seem like they should hold up and give us lots of playing time. Edit : one paddle broke after a mis-hit ball. Contacted seller and he sent a new paddle plus some more balls . AWESOME SELLER !!!
customer_reviews.author: foodog71

customer_reviews.title: I'm enjoyed my winnig game with this paddle
customer_reviews.text: I got this greatthing 3days ago. Nomally my type of play style is use spin much. Last night i met a rival friend and play with him,,, finally i bit him lol. And he was asked me where did i get a new paddle. But i didnt tell him. I'm enjoyed my winnig game with this paddle. Oh also we used be use stiga balls last night we play with this ball (free included) this balls feel like expensive ball like stiga or butterfly. That was great play with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kyungchul park

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddles at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I would have been so happy to have such nice paddles as a child. This is a great deal, as these are very nice paddles. The carrying case is a nice touch, and there are enough balls to last for quite a while (8). The paddles are comfortable in the hand, durable, and even pretty. My son banged one against the table, and it broke. The seller immediately sent me a new one with some extra balls as a gift and a handwritten letter stating that the paddles would be replaced within a year of purchase should they break. I’m very impressed by this customer service. I can’t imagine one being disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Paransky

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles for ping pong.
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are great. They feel Really good and feel very high quality. The paddles feel a little thicker and have a little softer touch on the hits due to the extra thickness. Been really good for spinning the ball and countering spins. It’s a tad expensive but I definitely felt like it was good quality and worth the money. Great ping pong balls as well. Curious to see how they hold up over time but so far so good. Never heard of this company before but I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernSeahawk

customer_reviews.title: Really bad odor!
customer_reviews.text: To me, a paddle is a paddle, but I bought these paddles because they were "Amazon recommended. " After I unwrapped the packaging from the paddles, I noticed that they stink!!! Not sure if it was the plastic packaging around the paddles that stink or if it's the paddles themselves, but I had to put them in another room. They have a mixture of a skunk smell and bad cauliflower. I'll check in a few weeks to see if the smell is still there, and if not, then I'll change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ann

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews on Amazon prior to my purchase. One mentioned that they would send additional ping pong balls. After receiving the paddles and eight balls, I found that my grandchildren were proficient in losing balls when they played. I emailed requesting some additional balls and they arrived just a few days after my request with a personal note, hand-written by the owner. The paddles and balls are exceptional quality. Well worth the price. I would strongly recommend this purchase. The product is exceptional and I would strongly recommend this product but the customer service is way beyond anything that I expected. Well done JP Winlook!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Haderlie

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but one broke.
customer_reviews.text: We love the feel and apparent quality of these paddles! Sadly, after less than one month of average play, and not being abused (albeit used by my kid beginning players), one of the paddles has snapped in half during normal gameplay. The others show no signs of the same fate, yet. Stay tuned. UPDATE: Within minutes of contacting the seller through Amazon, I received a response from the OWNER OF THE COMPANY who is sending a new replacement paddle via two day shipping plus a few more balls! Outstanding service and we like the product. Hopefully the breakage was just a fluke. Upgrading to five stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: HLarson3

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. Good quality. The carry case is an added bonus. I had a defect on 2 paddles, but still gave it a 5 star rating. I received an email from the seller and they are replacing the paddles at no cost. A lot easier than returning and reordering. Customer service is top notch. Highly recommend this set!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles and balls
customer_reviews.text: Not much else to say... This is a great set. The paddles are surprising quality. Easily as good as some of the entry level paddles from the big boys at 1/4 the price. The balls are very good. I like them better than the Stiga 3 star. Everyone has been very satisfied with these when they come to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Maggard

customer_reviews.title: comfort and control
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my brother as a gift. They really like the paddles but felt they were a little heavy compared to their older paddles, but said they were getting use to the weight. I stopped last night for a Christmas meal and had a chance to try them. I really liked the paddle even if they were a sight bit heavier. I did notice the paddle I was using was starting to peel a tiny bit, and told my brother to put a little glue on it so I hope that isn't a problem in the future. I felt the rubber was good quality and they felt comfortable using a shake hand grip. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice. The paddles are great and the balls as well. I like the case, too. My only complaint is that the paddles had a really strong smell at first, but it has dissipated now.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pitchford

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent value. 4 paddles and 8 3-Star balls. I am far from an expert player, so my opinion is based on the way the paddles felt in my hand and the ball control they provided me. I am more than pleased with my purchase. Great customer service!!! The Seller, "Ping Larse", provided personal attention for one of the paddles I had an issue with. Ping responded super quickly and immediately shipped me another paddle plus another 5 balls. Better Customer Service than I could have hope for.
customer_reviews.author: SteveP

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality for the price you’re paying for these paddles. I love that they come with a carrying case for convenient storage in my apartment. Awesome customer service! I was contacted by the seller making sure that I was completely satisfied with my purchase, because if I wasn’t, they would have made sure I was happy by any means necessary. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddles.  Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice paddles. I'm quite happy with them. What's more important, JP WinLook will take care of you if there is anything wrong. One of our paddles had a bubble under the padding, and they sent us a new replacement, along with 2 used paddles (that looked practically new), at no cost to us. You can buy these paddles with confidence - you'll be happy, or they will take care of it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Astalos

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Even with the high reviews I remained skeptical until I used these paddles. Essentially a beginner, playing table tennis at home with friends and family, didn't expect paddles at this price to be noticably better then the 'better' paddles purchased at a local store but as soon as we started playing we were impressed with the responsiveness of these paddles. Control, spin and bounce are all quite good and everyone likes them better than any paddles we used previously. Great paddles for the money. (The included balls were not as good as the quality balls we use but they were not a consideration when looking for better paddles).
customer_reviews.author: Frydspam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The paddles and ping pong balls are of great quality. Enjoy playing with this equipment. Also, had an issue with crushed ping pong balls and let Ping know and he immediately sent replacement balls. He went above and beyond so Excellent customer service as well. Will definitely purchase more products from this company and highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Begineer rider

customer_reviews.title: Paddle broken during first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my son for Christmas. I thought this was a nice set, it seemed sturdy. We opened them today and tried them out. After a half hour of using them, the red paddle broke at the handle. Very sad. We were only able to use these for 30 minutes! I wanted to try to contact the seller, instead of leaving a negative review, but there was no option to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Summer044

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paddles, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 paddles and have been very pleased. The paddles are sticky and the balls grip the table and paddles well. But one of the paddles broke when my wife smacked my buns-o-steel, and I didn't expect to get a replacement, because it didn't break during what I would consider normal use. However, JP Winlook sent an email when I bought the paddles, telling me to let them know about any problems. I emailed them explaining what happened, and got a reply within 20 minutes saying they would replace the paddle. The replacement paddle just arrived, with a hand-written note, and is perfect like the others. I couldn't recommend these paddles and this company more highly.
customer_reviews.author: Bret G

customer_reviews.title: Peeling Paddle Face
customer_reviews.text: Surprised to find that after 5 one hour sessions of teaching my wife to play, the black face on one of the two paddles we've been using is starting, at the top of the paddle, to peel away from the paddle. I will glue it in place, likely with Locktite. These are good looking , well made paddles and, hopefully, this is an aberration, but the manufacturer should take a hard look at the adhesive being used in the production process. Otherwise I'd have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle but strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have played with the paddles for a few days, great. Major complaint is the smell. When I first peeled off the plastic, the chemical smell I inhaled was *dizzling*. Extremely unpleasant. Now several days passed, the smell when you are close to the paddle is still strong. It doesn’t go away. I’m a little concerned for the kids to hold them.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: They STINK (olfactory wise-not quality wise as of yet)
customer_reviews.text: Just got them. Unwrapped them and they stink to high heaven of some awful industrial shrink wrap smell. I am letting them "air out" before I use them but my God 5 days later and they still smell like something between "dissect a frog in class today smell" and the stench I used to get back in my younger days when the "GIRLS GIRLS GIRLS" revue at the strip club started cranking up.
customer_reviews.author: bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edited** Moved up to 5 stars because the owner reached out to me, and is sending me a new paddle for free. He even threw in 2 used paddles just to be nice. Fantastic customer service, and damn good paddles. That's tough to beat! I wish the paddles had flared handles to ensure they don't slip out of your hand. Additionally, one of our paddles already broke. They are quality paddles, but now we don't have a set of 4. I hope the company can contact me to help get another paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great rackets but don’t like the included balls
customer_reviews.text: I like the rackets, but the balls seems unbalanced. Not sure, but the bounce sometimes doesn’t seem logic to the strength and direction of the play
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Salem

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERED AS PROMISED
customer_reviews.text: I LIVE WAY FAR UP IN THE MOUNTAINS -- AND THE BOY AND HIS BROTHERS WHO RECEIVED THIS GIFT LIVE DOWN IN THE VALLEY. I HAVE YET TO HEAR FROM THE BOY THIS GIFT WAS SENT TO -- (ALONG WITH A TENNIS TABLE) -- BUT WHEN I DO GET A MESSAGE I WILL SEND IT ON TO YOU. I HAVE NO DOUBTS THAT YOUR PRODUCT IS VERY WELL MADE! SINCERELY, THE GRANDMA PS: THANK YOU FOR YOUR PROMISED DELIVERY . PERFECT !
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Paddles, Even More Impressive Service
customer_reviews.text: The first set of paddles had a very unpleasant smell - almost like a fish market. After contacting the seller, they personally mailed the paddles with a handwritten apology letter same-day! Unbelievable customer service!! Other than the smell, the paddles are of very good quality - the rubber has not budged despite a month of pretty rough use. The balls are my favorite out of all of the balls we've used thus far. Well-worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Value
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to replace our aging Stiga paddles at work. They had been repaired serveral times and were definitely in need of replacement. Everyone that has picked them up for a round has remarked on the better feel and performance. None of us are by any means professionals, but for recreational use they work really well and at least let us stop blaming the paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Thin paddle handle grip else great paddle
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were nice paddles at first. After using 2 of the paddles for one day, one of the handles broke off. And other became loose just hanging but sure tomorrow it will loose (may be I need to glue). will contact vendor. Another thing is noticeable thin paddle handle grip (thinner handle wood). This is response from Vendor:I read your review about the grip wood, I am in the process to increase the thickness, but the thicker grip paddles will need 6 months to the market. The owner sent another set with refund which is extremely gracious. Will get back new set when thickness is increased.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Must buy. Other (brand name) sets don't even come close!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality for the price. Blows away the similarly priced Stiga set. We bought that set last time and the rubber is not sticky at all, very beginner set. This set has sticky rubber, covered with plastic like the expensive paddles so it stays clean and sticky during shipment. They really play nice, you can't go wrong. Not sure yet about durability since we've only had them a week, but they were used by a bunch of kids with minimum supervision at our cookout, and none of them have any damage besides some scuffs on the rubber. That tells me they're durable enough!
customer_reviews.author: G. Willette

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, great service.
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are Hugh quality and perform well. So far after 4-5 hrs of play they are holding up well. Also, the customer service is excellent. I had a slight problem with 2 of the balls not bouncing as well as the others and they were very promptly replaced with 10 balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great set and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We love this set! With the quarantine, we have been playing a lot of ping pong inside! We had an issue with one of our paddles, and this company went above and beyond to make things right. We will keep playing ping pong, taking the game to whole new levels!
customer_reviews.author: Olney mom

customer_reviews.title: No spins after one game
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set given the low price and I would most certainly recommend this to those who play for fun. However, if you are looking for a paddle that would allow you to do spins - avoid this one. The paddle looses its spin ability after one game, I guess because of the rubber pad is not of right quality. I played with several different paddles and this one is by far the worst one.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Good price for family play This is a quality paddle ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price for family play This is a quality paddle set for family play and also for beginner recreational fun. The paddles look good. Rubber and sponge got reasonable thickness. There is some smell (as it's new), but that goes away after some time. But if you are advanced player, or are planning for serious training for kids, do not buy ready-made paddles like this, even the $55 Stiga Pro Carbon did not feel right for me. My kids' coach suggested to look for paddle > $100 or better customized, i.e. buy paddle and rubber separately and then glue them together.
customer_reviews.author: Sheng Sun

customer_reviews.title: Standard paddle, great quality
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are a standard shape, size, and weight, but the quality is well beyond most in this price range. My co-workers and I play table tennis in the break room at work, and of about 4 different brands donated by players, the Winlooks are the only ones that still have their padding intact (compared to even some brand name paddles). Surface grip spin shots is excellent and the handles are solid. A bonus was the high quality of the ping pong balls, which are my favorite to play with. They have a great bounce and last for a very long time! A great value for a starter kit, and I will be buying Winlooks again!
customer_reviews.author: Demaray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight and thickness, great surface, unbelievable value.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy in a good way, feels great in the hand. I love these and can't believe the excellent quality for such an amazing price. Quality, quality, quality. I did file down one side edge near the top of the handle just for personal preference. If I need paddles again or am recommending paddles for someone else, I'd definitely go with this set again. No doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Great paddle, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great paddle. Shipping came a day early, good value for the money, feels like a higher end paddle. We’ve been playing with them for two weeks during the great quarantine of 2020 and the whole family likes them. Great cushioning, good control, the balls are also excellent. My ONLY critique-and it has to do with the bag, not the paddles...the bag opens from the bottom, and not where the handle is, this could cause problems if you think it is zipped, everything could fall out.
customer_reviews.author: bmcn

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive paddles
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing table tennis. We had a stack of old paddles in our basement which definitely needed to be replaced. These paddles improved my game a little, however, I had been playing with our only decent paddle. On the other hand, my husband's game improved immensely as he was able to get more spin action on the ball. He really likes the paddles and the balls that came with them.
customer_reviews.author: D37

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for spin!
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm not going on circuit anytime soon to show off my table tennis talent, but I do like to use a lot of spin. My friends and I keep the ball moving at a pretty good clip. I love the feel of these paddles and I miss them terribly when I have to use someone else's paddles. If you don't like to spin the ball, these may not be for you. But, if you like to use a lot of spin and don't want to spend $100+ on a single paddle, this is the paddle for you!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: These paddles and balls are fantastic! I’m not that great at ping pong, but instantly played a bit better with these. They are comfortable and make it a bit easier to put a spin on the ball than the cheaper paddles. They also come in a nice case to store everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Are these great paddles? No. Is this set a great value? Yes. These paddles are extremely well made for a paddle that only cost ten dollars per paddle. While a bit heavy these paddles have a nice sticky feel and are easy to spin the ball with. If you are looking for a paddle that will give you a lot of speed my suggestion is to upgrade. You will probably have to upgrade to a paddle the cost between $25 to $35 per paddle. Would I buy this set again? Yes, without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Solid paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat these paddles. They are comfortable to hold, have good response, and are just plain fun to use. The pack comes with 8 3 star balls and four paddles which will get you playing doubles right out of the gate. My son has dropped or thrown (accidentally) his paddle multiple times while playing, and the rubber is still holding fast and the paddles are still in good shape. These are not professional paddles, but for the price, and the general good feel, I highly recommend these for family use.
customer_reviews.author: shang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: For the price these paddles are great, and the customer service is second to none. I received the set quickly, but one paddle had a small defect. When I contacted JP Winlook, they replied almost immediately and advised they would be send a replacement. I would recommend this set to any player from novice to experienced. The only negative thing is the smell of the glue when you first unwrap them. JP Winlook said the smell would go away and is caused by being stored at the Amazon warehouse and sealed for months.
customer_reviews.author: The 33 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddles!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice paddles! I love the robbery paddle and the protected edges, They feel and look like professional paddles and are very worth the money! Maybe they are professional panels? Nice feel and play well. They’re definitely nicer than the ones we had as kids back in the 1970s! My husband thinks the handle should be longer but I think their normal typical length, not sure what a regulation length is but these are about 5” long from the rubber to the end of the paddle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ruffing

customer_reviews.title: Great set and remarkable product support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set and with remarkable product support starting with the fast delivery and then solving a minor problem quickly. I really like these paddles and enjoy playing with them. I had a minor problem with one of the paddles that had a slight dent and a small defect. The owner of the company responded immediately to my concern and replaced the paddle and even more within days. It is clear that product support is a major benefit from dealing with this company. Buy with confidence and enjoy the game!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Homesteader

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle, good construction, does not feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: We are recreational players just having fun in the house. The paddle is constructed well and feels solid. The handle is constructed nicely and the pads are good. Easy to use, easy to apply spins on the ball. I would recommend this to any recreational user.
customer_reviews.author: MYamo

customer_reviews.title: Good set for a rec players
customer_reviews.text: Good, cheap set for recreational players. I bought these for our new table for guests and the kids. They are well made, the rubber is good rubber for rec players who do not play competitively. For now it is "sticky". Good set for the kids to destroy, and I can sleep well knowing I didn't overspend.
customer_reviews.author: DangerMouse

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles
customer_reviews.text: We got a ping pong table for Christmas last December. After reading many reviews we chose these paddles. We have played many games and have had no issues with the quality of the paddles. They look great, and are comfortable to hold. Updade Aug 2020: The paddles are still holding up to frequent use. We have kept them on porch on AZ heat and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Good set that provides a great first impression
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Its held up well over the last couple of weeks and still looks good. No peeling of the pad has been observed. I have noticed the surface of one of paddles shows indents on the outer edges but this has not affected its performance. Overall, good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C.Sethi

customer_reviews.title: WinLook Ping Pong Paddles
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the paddle, both the grip and the paddle material are top notch! These are comparable to the very expensive paddles that are also considered 'pro-level', but cost 5 times as much!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Service
customer_reviews.text: We've been very pleased with the JP WinLook Pro Premium Table Tennis Racket set we purchased. We had to replace one paddle and Ping Larse, Owner of JP WinLook was quick to respond and replaced the paddle with no questions asked. They stand behind their products and provide great customer service. Ping even included extra ping pong balls and a hand written letter thanking us for our purchase. Hard to find service like JP WinLook offers.
customer_reviews.author: David Crews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Paddles are an excellent value and well made at this price point. Rubber surface is grippy. Sponge surface might be a little on the hard side, but it performs very well, and I’m able to produce good spin on balls. Handle is a little short for my x-large sized hand, but not enough to cause discomfort. Balls are well made. Everything works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Nice set with good paddles.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice paddles. My kids love to play ping pong and two of them have pretty nice paddles that cost much more than these for just one paddle. They commented that these paddles were almost as nice as theirs, and that the grippy ribber was great for spin. The only downside to these is the strong rubber smell when you peel off the plastic, but it abates with time. The balls are good too. Light and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: ctx1050

customer_reviews.title: Great table tennis racket set
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality table tennis racket set. Also, the owner of JP Winlook provided me with excellent customer service when I had a problem. In my case, my son bent the handle of his racket. When I tried to bend it back to the original position, the handle broke. I wrote the owner, and he immediately replied, sent me another racket along with several table tennis balls as a gift. I recommend this set for its quality and the owner's great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pollack

customer_reviews.title: This time cheap price equaled cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Initially paddles seemed pretty nice. After few weeks of playing I have one paddle with a loose handle and one that the handle snapped off from the paddle. Basically I guess you get what you pay for. I’m getting ready to order new paddles from a different company. Hopefully I have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Earl P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very good customer service, the owner was very responsive and solved my issues promptly. The products it is great for beginners and is good value for money with this 2 extra rackets and balls. We are having hours of fun playing with our kids
customer_reviews.author: nely

customer_reviews.title: Great Package
customer_reviews.text: We just got our first ping pong table and this package was the perfect beginner's package. It has a bunch of balls and four really nice paddles. We've been enjoying this very much so as far as I can tell, this is a great package and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Worosylo

customer_reviews.title: These are definitely pro level paddles, very high quality! <3
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pro ping pong player and I have to say these paddles are professional level. The paddles are great quality, not like the kind you find in Walmart of even Academy. Def check these paddles out if you like win! Great set to use to improved your skill, easy to make spin, and control the ball very well. After I put a spanking on my friends (also pros) they asked me where I got them. I'm really surprised by the quality, on Amazon you never can tell! lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: From my email to JP Winlook: My family just got the set of four paddles and balls from Amazon. Just wanted to let you know that we think that they are great paddles and an especially high value for the money. Our game and control went up immediately. I also have to say that the balls are superior to most on the market.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDE D'ESTREE

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddles!
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are comfortable and have a rubber (or rubber-like) playing surface that can impart good spin on the ball. We've used them over several hours of practice rallying, and have no issues with separation (de-lamination) of the playing surface. So, we're very happy with the set and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glassy Raven

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Paddles/balls are great...you can really feel the quality compared to others. Customer service was great when I reached out to them super fast response. Would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product when I first got it. Unfortunately, one of the paddles broke due to a defect. I emailed Customer Service and with in minutes I had a reply letting me know a replacement paddle was on its way with a few extra balls for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Noice

customer_reviews.title: Poor build and does not last!  Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor build quality. One paddle broke in less than 6 weeks of moderate play. Rubber is cheap quality. Invest in a Stiga or Joola.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paddles, nice quality and packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, high quality product. The paddles are well balanced and have good weight. The packaging is also very nice - it’s a zippered case for storage that holds all the paddles and balls. The quality is so high, it looks and feels like a product from 40 years ago. Very nice. Highest recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Jon N

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: we've been using the paddle and balls for a week, no complaints, solid product. Update 10/8/18 Within three weeks of using the paddles, the adhesive on paddles started coming off. We unpacked second set, and the plastic wrap had stuck onto the paddle and tore a piece of rubber off.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Broken paddle
customer_reviews.text: My son and I were playing earlier today, and his paddle broke during a normal swing. We've had the set for 3 months, and we play sporadically. Up until now, the paddles and balls have both played well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddles but paddles surface are really cheap
customer_reviews.text: I order this product after seeing awesome 5 star review but when i get the product 2 of the paddles rubber already came out after i just used for 5 min other then that its a awesome product
customer_reviews.author: manish kuwar

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE PADDLES!
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are simply fantastic. Honestly, I've never played so well. Everything about them is spot on and the price cannot be beat. As mentioned in other reviews, the customer service is absolutely amazing. My set came with a couple of defective paddles. I contacted JP and within a day, he sent me not 2, but 3 replacement paddles. He is an absolute pleasure to deal with, such a nice man. He stands by his product and his product is GREAT. You have a lifelong customer here. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Y Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice set and excellent customer service with a seller who stands by their product.
customer_reviews.text: *update - contacted the seller and had a fast response. They are sending a replacement paddle out. Very pleased with the customer service. Seller has gone above and beyond to stand by the quality of their product. We’ve had this set for a little over a week and one paddle already is splitting near the handle. We were really pleased initially, but to have the paddles already falling apart so quickly is extremely disappointing. The other paddles and the balls are holding up and working well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product, Overall Happy
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with the product and believe it was a good value and would recommend. The handles are unfinished wood and while not smooth is probably a plus for keeping a grip on the paddle. A couple of the name inserts on the handle are not set correctly causing there to be a slight uneasy feeling while playing. One paddle arrived with dents all-over the paddle face, looks as if someone beat it with a hammer before shipping, though I assume it was a problem with the adhesive. I believe the company has put out a very nice paddle set but needs to work through assembly problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit to play ping pong !!!
customer_reviews.text: The carry case is very convenient to keep everything on place. Balls are great quality. The only concern (in my case) is the grip on the paddle is too thin and short. I don't know if is because my hands are big for this kind of paddle but my wife has same problem. The other thing i noticed paddle grip should be more smooth but not big deal Overall the ping pong set is really good ...will buy again !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality. One ping pong paddle handle broke the second time we used them. The handle of a second paddle also broke not long after. I was hoping they would be sturdier since it got so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: SALOME H. KIM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift. The surface of the paddles is very nice but I was disappointed that the handles seem unfinished - i.e. raw wood with no clear coat or oil rubbed finish. I'm hoping these do not break down with use due to no protective coating on the wood. The handles are also a little short compared to others I've used. Surprised about this since the price suggested a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: LifeRegeneration

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Usually paddles have dimples. These were smooth and sticky. They play well, so guess the dimples dont matter.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hankenhof

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: The smell was so strong we couldn’t use it. Would not recommend this item as it will stink-up the whole room. Update 5/6/19: after posting my review I received a full refund. Smell was due to warehouse issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Gorbatenko

customer_reviews.title: Nice Paddles at the right price
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect to go with my new table. I actually bought two more expensive paddle, but I like these better. The 4 paddles alone were worth the $40 price, making the balls and case a nice bonus. The case is at least useful to hold a handful of extra balls and can fit a 5th paddle comfortably (6 is tight). I don't see any added value to actually using the mesh inside the case, much easier just to throw the balls into the empty space, can fit at least 20 this way.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: High quality plus reasonable pricing equals great value.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was that my son is getting better than me. We had some basic nubby paddles we were using that were falling apart. This set was far superior. I have a huge container of ping pong balls so I didn’t buy the set for the balls, but we like these balls better than the Stiga balls we were using. That was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: good paddle,  even better balls
customer_reviews.text: I am not a pro, the paddles are nice with perfect grip. The balls are especially good. Too bad that they don't sell the balls separately. My boys and their cousins had been having a blast
customer_reviews.author: drsuna

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it but smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Because of so many good reviews, I have decided to purchase this racket... I think they are pretty much well built, the reason why I give just two stars is because once they arrived, they smelled terrible. As soon as I opened the package, I had to leave all the rackets outside because of this certain smell. I left them out for two days straight and they still smell bad.. I don’t know if it smells really like this bad or just mine only... disappointed that I couldn’t use them right away...
customer_reviews.author: So Young Eom

customer_reviews.title: Gentle use recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Not a durable product. I have Stiga panels still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: R. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle set.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: They went above and beyond just being a seller. They actually personally and proactively followed up on my purchase to make sure I was happy with the paddle set. Their service sets them apart from the rest of the vendors that I am accustomed to working with. Thanks again. I will be a repeat customer. Sincerely, Greg Weaver
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made with awful materials.
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are very poorly made and should not be allowed on Amazon. They were loose when we opened them and already had one snap off, very little pressure. Don’t buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: roy rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Stinky wood
customer_reviews.text: The wood smells, and after using them, my hands smell. Everybody who has used them agrees
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Ups the game!
customer_reviews.text: I played varsity badminton in college, and appreciate good racquet equipment. These ping pong paddles are not only attractive, but feel well-balanced in the hand, and have a great hitting surface. The ping pong balls are professional level. The carrying case completes the feeling of taking the whole ping pong game up a notch. How did I ever do without this??
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Albert

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by quality
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about ping pong except its fun to play. We were using old Sportcraft paddles with the rubber part failing. Decided to step up our game and based on research and the reviews for this product, we ordered. Wow this paddles and balls are awesome. Great quality you might expect in a more expensive product. Now if only my game improves!
customer_reviews.author: Chincoteague

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I've used these paddles for quite some time now and the quality is amazing. Definitely nothing cheap that'll break after a few games. Very well made paddles and even friends who use them are quite pleased with them. The balls are also a great plus! I was really looking for paddles but the balls were a add-on and are 3-star ones and bounce very well back and forth. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Peter N. Abadear

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review: Very thoughtful follow up by the seller.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The seller reached out after my negative review. Very apologetic, kind, and thoughtful, we were given a full refund and they replaced the paddles for us. They're great now! Appreciate all the legwork on behalf of the seller to correct our original problem. Previous review: This paddles in this set fell apart complete after 2 weeks of gentle use (maybe 10 games?). The wood face pieces of the handle are sliding off and the red and black rubber faces completely fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Gail H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved the set, playing with the first two paddles out of the box. Noted a small defect in one of the others shortly after beginning play (which did not effect play). Notified the manufacturer and the problem was immediately rectified. GREAT customer service, and an exceptional product. Would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Grabinski

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and an amazing seller
customer_reviews.text: The seller is great communicator and responds in timely manner. Table tennis set is very high quality, exquisite , for beginners and for pros, young and old, for the price you could not find anything better out there. My mom used to play table tennis in her youth, she is in her 60’s now and the game is great way to connect with her grandkids. Thank you JP, will be buying from you again, and will recommend to all family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: sandymom

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set. I had purchased a less expensive brand, but wound up tossing it as it was very disappointing . Save yourself some time, money and grief and purchase this set. If you are a hi end player you will want a more expensive paddle suited to your playing style, but these are just good mid caliber no muss, no fuss paddles. Carrying case is nice accessory as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smigatron

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she was really happy with the paddles. She had been reading up on different paddles and said this was a great one. It came in a nice case to keep it organized.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiP13

customer_reviews.title: mostly happy with the paddles but haven't used the balls yet
customer_reviews.text: mostly happy with the paddles but haven't used the balls yet. Many times the stars are on the ball and not valid to the quality but cannot say either way at this time. Paddles worked fine except that it was a pain to get the protective coating off of them. When removing, it likes to come off in its own way and therefore left a bunch of little pieces that were a pain to get off. Only done 2 paddles so far and both had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Prose53

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Don't last.
customer_reviews.text: These seemed sturdy enough when I received them, though I did note that the adhesive on the paddles seemed light around the paddle edges. I have had them for 2 months, and 3 of the 4 paddles have broken. I have replaced them with another brand (Penn), which seem to be of much higher quality. I've included a picture of a broken paddle, as I feel it exemplifies the (poor) quality of these paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Kaily VanLaan

product_meta.title: JP WinLook Ping Pong Paddle - 4 Pack; Pro Premium Table Tennis Racket Set; 8 Professional Game Balls; Practice Accessories Racquet Bat Bundle Kit; Portable Cover Case; Indoor Outdoor
product_meta.description:
Finally, you find us! 

The founder and owner of JP WinLook is an advanced table tennis player. Our goal is to make table tennis one of the most popular sports – which is why we are in business to provide high-quality affordable ping pong paddles, balls, and nets. 

Today is your lucky day! 

No one has said that shopping for ping pong racquets is easy. In fact, figuring out what racket is the best fit for you can be complicated. Lots of people buy beginner racquets -- or cheap ones -- that they soon have to replace. We want you have the top quality your first try at a price you can afford. 

We are the manufacturer and table tennis players, too, so we know what you care about and need as an end user. We stand in your shoes (and socks, too!). We’ve paid utmost attention to detail while testing and proving our paddles countless times before we launched this product to the market for you. Your satisfaction is our champion trophy awards. We stand by our reputation of quality. 

Try it! You will love it! 

Ping-pong supplies are one of the best recreational fitness items to get father, mother, grandma, grandpa, son, daughter, grandson, granddaughter, … All adults kids can have fun playing single or double, hard or easy, inside or outside. Paddles are also the best toy for kids to play on a lightweight mid-size wooden tabletop. With score-board and trainer, small kids are quick learner and can start playing pingpong from 6 years old (even from toddler age, not a funny joke) on a little light mini short table with automatic machine launcher robot shooter feeder server in their comfort room, or on a conversion pool or air-hockey table. 

Make ping-pong be part of your life. Don’t wait! 

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 

- 4 paddles 
- 8 balls 
- 1 carrying/storage bag
feature_bullets: The brand you can trust: the founder and owner of JP WinLook is an advanced table tennis player.

Four-piece superior quality custom plywood ping-pong paddles technologically designed for balanced spin, control, and speed; eight top-notch tournament 40-mm, 3-star white balls meeting ITTF approved equipment regulation (size and weight) for official competition.

5-ply wood blade with ergonomic flared handle (holder) creates comfortable grip for long sessions; best performance elastic pads; eco-friendly natural rubber sheet; high-bounce orange (yellow) medium-soft sponge; and advanced edge tape to avoid side wear. Amazing craftsmanship and first-class materials!

Blue, zipped carrying bag / protector with compact combo gift design for perfect storage and organizer, easy travel carrying on-the-go to let 2-4 players enjoy indoor or outdoor professional or recreational games; standard black and red paddle face color; extra durable glue.

Designed to be used for all ages (young, old), female or male, and all skill levels: from starters and intermediate to all-round master players; kids, adults, and family; beautiful wooden raquets appeal to boys, girls, teens, and juniors for practice and training. Designed in USA.

Men, women, parents and grandparents – go get this special, prime sports gear as a present for your children, grandchildren, friends and family. Perfect for birthday parties, housewarming, graduation, Christmas, New Year’s Eve, 4th of July, and any other holiday. Make this table tennis deal for you now (sale)!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
